metadata.synopsis: If Lae'zel or GITH avatar is present they react tointeracting with the training dummies. If they aren't present, some other party character reacts with generic comment.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Load up CTY_Main_AGo to 1364; 1; -751interact with any of the training dummiessee the AD play

0.speaker: Player
0.text: A mind flayer dummy. Good for practising on.
